about.description:
e-antic is a C/C++ library to deal with real embedded number fields built
on top of ANTIC. It aims to privode the fastest possible exact arithmetic
operations and comparisons.

name: pyeantic

test:
  imports:
    - pyeantic
about:
  description: 'e-antic is a C/C++ library to deal with real embedded number fields
    built

    on top of ANTIC. It aims to privode the fastest possible exact arithmetic

    operations and comparisons.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/flatsurf/e-antic
  home: https://github.com/flatsurf/e-antic
  license: LGPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: embedded algebraic number fields
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - saraedum
    - videlec

about.description:
e-antic is a C/C++ library to deal with real embedded number fields built
on top of ANTIC. It aims to privode the fastest possible exact arithmetic
operations and comparisons.
